title: Densha Otoko: Gambare Doku Otoko
alternative_title: 電車男 がんばれ毒男! ; Densha Otoko: Gambare Doku Otoko ; Gambare Doku Otoko ; Train Man: Go, Poison Man!
status: 電車男 がんばれ毒男! ; Densha Otoko: Gambare Doku Otoko ; Gambare Doku Otoko ; Train Man: Go, Poison Man!
description:
Description :
        *manga is based on a true story and the true story was done in 2ch* It's about an Otaku guy who fell in love with this beautiful lady and tries his best to get that girl with a lot of help from 2channelers (people who goes/posts on 2ch). This story has become very famous in Japan and I believe they now have novels, several series of Manga (both Shoujo and Shounen), movie, drama, play, etc, etc.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2 : One Small Step For A Normal Man One Giant Leap For An Otaku!!
Vol.1 Chapter 1 : Is The Single Guy Burning
